mapper.insert: insert all into member (mno, mid, mname, mpass, mcode) values (member_mno.nextval, #{mid}, #{mname}, #{mpass}, #{mcode}) into member_detail (mgender, email1, email2, phone1, phone2, phone3, mjoindate, mno) values (#{mgender}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, sysdate, member_mno.nextval) select * from dual
